Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.spi

Class ResourceFolderResolverService

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.spi.ResourceFolderResolverService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class ResourceFolderResolverService extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
Not public API

resolveResourceFolder(ResourceFolderIdentifier) iterates through implementations of the ResourceFolderResolver interface provided by Java's ServiceLoader and resolves ResourceFolderIdentifiers by calling ResourceFolderResolver.accepts(ResourceFolderIdentifier) until it reaches a resolver that recognizes the identifier. It then returns the resolved resource with ResourceFolderResolver.resolve(ResourceFolderIdentifier).

Access

  • resourceFolderResolverService()

Resolution

  • resolveResourceFolder(ResourceFolderIdentifier)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
